name: FlexGet+
author: LinuxServer.io + Runtipi community
description: Multipurpose automation tool for all of your media. Support for torrents, nzbs, podcasts, comics, TV, movies, RSS, and more.
short_desc: Media automation and RSS management tool.

form_fields.label: User ID (PUID)
form_fields.hint: User ID to run the container as (default: 1000)

form_fields.label: Group ID (PGID)
form_fields.hint: Group ID to run the container as (default: 1000)

form_fields.label: Web UI Password
form_fields.hint: Password for accessing the FlexGet web interface
